title: Turkey Bolognese
description: Ground turkey, crushed tomatoes, garlic, and whole wheat pasta. A family favorite that hits the macros right.
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add diced onion and cook 3-4 minutes until softened.
Add garlic and cook 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add ground turkey, breaking it up with a spoon. Cook until browned, about 6-7 minutes.
Add crushed tomatoes, Italian seasoning, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.
Simmer on low for 10-15 minutes to let flavors develop.
Serve over pasta and top with fresh basil.
